title: Black Adam
writer: Adam Sztykiel, Rory Haines, Sohrab Noshirvani
short_cast: Dwayne Johnson, Aldis Hodge, Pierce Brosnan, Noah Centineo, Sarah Shahi, Quintessa Swindell, Marwan Kenzari, Bodhi Sabongui, Mohammed Amer, James Cusati-Moyer
cast: Dwayne Johnson, Aldis Hodge, Pierce Brosnan, Noah Centineo, Sarah Shahi, Quintessa Swindell, Marwan Kenzari, Bodhi Sabongui, Mohammed Amer, James Cusati-Moyer
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 13 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 13
desc: Freed from his magical prison, a champion with the powers of the gods toes the line between good and evil as the Justice Society tries to contain him.
